A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I can understand Mark Hamill's disappointment at Disney's treatment of Luke Skywalker .. so so bad; total cop out .. basically very little left of the original\, well loved character .. I actually feel sorry for Hamill; damn shame that is .. no respect given for possibly the greatest cinematic hero ever created .. screw you Micky Mouse\, ya rat !! 

The most striking cinematic experience married to the most horrendous possible story arc .. what the hell will Eps IX bring ? 

My childhood has gone up in the lamest of possible flame storms .. lol\, i guess.

They went for something bold here and in the final analyses i believe Disney will have alienated a healthy margin of the fan base.
